news.title: Londonâ€™s Heathrow Airport closes after major fire nearby, sparking global travel chaos
news.summary: A fire at a nearby electrical substation caused a power outage. Heathrow Airport closed on Friday after the fire at the substation. Airport officials said the power outage was caused by an electrical fire.

news.title: Nike expects sales will plunge in current quarter as it faces tariffs, sliding consumer confidence
news.summary: Nike is trying to execute a turnaround under new CEO Elliott Hill. The company has lost more than $1 billion in the last three years.

news.title: Accenture is DOGE's first corporate casualty as shares dive on warning that contracts will be cut
news.summary: Shares of Accenture slid more than 7% on Thursday. The consulting firm said tighter federal spending efforts have begun to weigh on its revenues.

news.title: Nvidia CEO Huang says he was wrong about timeline for quantum, surprised his comments hurt stocks
news.summary: Jensen Huang, CEO of Nvidia, says his prior comments about quantum computing came out wrong. Huang made the admission at his company's "Quantum Day"

news.title: Trump floats sending Tesla attackers to El Salvador prisons as White House rallies to defend Musk
news.summary: Elon Musk donated more than $250 million toward President Trump's successful presidential campaign. Tesla and SpaceX boss Elon Musk is the world's richest man.
